SoftwareType.Name: Website
SoftwareType.Description: A great place to place your products, that's for sure!

Category.Name: Default
Category.Description: A simple website for any need!

Category.Name: Streaming Site
Category.Description: Create a site which people can do livestreams, watch livestreams, and stream!

Category.Name: Forum
Category.Description: A great feature for your website!

Category.Name: Search Engine
Category.Description: Create a search engine making people able to search on different webbrowsers!

Category.Name: Online Games
Category.Description: Create a website where people can play free online games!

Category.Name: News
Category.Description: Create a website to display news!

Category.Name: Filehoster
Category.Description: File hosting is a service that allows customers to store files over the Internet on a central data store of the file hosting provider. It allows access to the files from any location where Internet is available.

Category.Name: Imageboard
Category.Description: An image board is a bulletin board system (BBS) on the Internet, which is used mainly to exchange pictures and discuss about them.

Category.Name: Webshop
Category.Description: Earn money with the distribution of goods.

Feature.Name: Coding
Feature.Description: You need this to start coding your website!

Feature.Name: Base and Layout
Feature.Description: The base of your website, no color or style

Feature.Name: Design Tools
Feature.Description: Gives it a little more stylish feature

Feature.Name: Better Coding
Feature.Description: More advanced coding

Feature.Name: Server Side Scripting
Feature.Description: Scripting involving servers

Feature.Name: Interactivity
Feature.Description: Make different cool stuff!

Feature.Name: Simple player
Feature.Description: This is just the base of the player for your website

Feature.Name: Channels
Feature.Description: Let people create their very own channel on your website

Feature.Name: Follower
Feature.Description: Letting users follow the streamer

Feature.Name: Title
Feature.Description: Allows users to give their stream a title

Feature.Name: Description
Feature.Description: Allows users to give their stream a description

Feature.Name: Genre
Feature.Description: Allowing your users to add genres to their stream

Feature.Name: Chat
Feature.Description: Gives the viewers the ability to chat on the stream

Feature.Name: Topics
Feature.Description: Allow users to create topics

Feature.Name: Categories
Feature.Description: Allow users to create categories.

Feature.Name: Logo
Feature.Description: Allows users to create an logo to their forums

Feature.Name: Boards
Feature.Description: Allows users to create different boards making a more organised forum

Feature.Name: Child Boards
Feature.Description: Allows users to create boards inside a board - Boardception

Feature.Name: Private Messages
Feature.Description: Allows users to message eachother

Feature.Name: Base
Feature.Description: The base of your Search engine

Feature.Name: Settings
Feature.Description: Gives users an opportunity to choose simple settings

Feature.Name: I'm feeling lucky!
Feature.Description: How lucky are you?

Feature.Name: Images
Feature.Description: Any picture on the internet! Even explicit! OMG!

Feature.Name: Maps
Feature.Description: If they are lost, they can just use your map!"

Feature.Name: Quantum Search
Feature.Description: Makes searching (almost) instant

Feature.Name: Translate
Feature.Description: Need to translate something into another language? This is just what you need!

Feature.Name: Layout
Feature.Description: Layout of your website

Feature.Name: Events
Feature.Description: Shows events like festivals that are upcoming.

Feature.Name: Neighbourhood
Feature.Description: Shows you what is happening in your neighbourhood / city, based on your IP / Geo-Datas.

Feature.Name: News
Feature.Description: Shows the worldnews in a specific news-feed.

Feature.Name: Name
Feature.Description: Addition to profile details

Feature.Name: Birthday
Feature.Description: Addition to profile details

Feature.Name: Age
Feature.Description: Addition to profile details

Feature.Name: Profile Status
Feature.Description: This will let people share photos, videos or just write some text to share with friends!

Feature.Name: 2D Games
Feature.Description: Allows people to play 2D games!

Feature.Name: 3D Games
Feature.Description: Meh, 3D internet games are OK

Feature.Name: Game Categories
Feature.Description: Make the games look more presentable by putting them in categories

Feature.Name: Search Bar
Feature.Description: To make finding games easier

Feature.Name: Accounts
Feature.Description: Allow users to sign up to earn achivements, save their progress, and much more

Feature.Name: Avatars
Feature.Description: Real people make unreal things!

Feature.Name: Public Uploads
Feature.Description: Allows the public to upload their games (as long as they're in the guide lines!)

Feature.Name: Anonymous upload
Feature.Description: Allows uploading stuff without having an account.

Feature.Name: User upload
Feature.Description: Allows uploading stuff for people who're registered.

Feature.Name: Tags
Feature.Description: User can set tags for finding uploads through the search function.

Feature.Name: Repost identifier
Feature.Description: Don't let your imageboard flood by tons of reposts. Let the system block uploading pictures that are already on the server.

Feature.Name: Image editing
Feature.Description: Allows you to edit your images a bit or create memes of them.

Feature.Name: GIF's
Feature.Description: The era of static images is over!

Feature.Name: webM's
Feature.Description: The modern and much more qualitative alternative to GIF's.

Feature.Name: Subtitle editor
Feature.Description: Allows to create subtitels for videos.

Feature.Name: IRC
Feature.Description: Allows to chat with other users.

Feature.Name: Favorites
Feature.Description: You can mark uploads as favorites.

Feature.Name: Contributor stats
Feature.Description: Shows how many uploads, comments, favorites etc. the user has set.

Feature.Name: User ranking
Feature.Description: A ranked system, where the user see how active he is in contrast to other users.

Feature.Name: Delete link
Feature.Description: A link for deleting your uploaded stuff.

Feature.Name: End-user encoding
Feature.Description: The files be en- and decrypted on the users system, not on the server. So noone can check what you have uploaded.

Feature.Name: 1 GB Cloud
Feature.Description: All you files are stored in here. Also allows synchronisation with other OS.

Feature.Name: Premium features
Feature.Description: For a bit of money you get a chunk of extra features.

Feature.Name: Faster Up- / Downloadrate
Feature.Description: Maximum traffic with premium features!

Feature.Name: 16 GB Cloud
Feature.Description: All you files are stored in here. Also allows synchronisation with other OS.

Feature.Name: 32 GB Cloud
Feature.Description: All you files are stored in here. Also allows synchronisation with other OS.

Feature.Name: Browser App
Feature.Description: Shortened loading times.

Feature.Name: Virus protection
Feature.Description: Scans up- and downloaded files.

Feature.Name: Video player
Feature.Description: Plays / streams videos directly in the browser, without downloading.

Feature.Name: News Videos
Feature.Description: Videos about the news!

Feature.Name: Comment Section
Feature.Description: Let people argue about topics!

Feature.Name: Recommendations
Feature.Description: Automatically recommends topics you may be interested in!
